project.ss.engine
Class ControledPlayerImpl

java.lang.Object
  project.ss.engine.ControledPlayerImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
ControledPlayer, Player
public class ControledPlayerImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements ControledPlayer

This class provides the implementation of both the basic Player interface and more capable ControlledPlayer interface.
